item.title: Trump taps former Sen. David Perdue as ambassador to China
Newsom rails against Trump's 25% tariff plan during southern border visit: 'It's a betrayal'
item.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom criticized Trump's proposed 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada, warning of harm to Californians as he prepares to 'Trump-proof' state.

item.title: Trump names David Sacks as White House AI and cryptocurrency czar
item.description: President-elect Trump named former PayPal Chief Operating Officer David Sacks to be his White House artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency czar.

item.title: Fox News Politics: Defining DOGE
item.description: The Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump transition, exclusive interviews and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Pete Hegseth says he will be 'standing right here in this fight' after meeting with senators
item.description: Pete Hegseth met with more senators on Thursday in an effort to shore up his defense secretary nomination ahead of confirmation hearings.
